author: daxian-dbw
body: The PR #3903 makes powershell core depend on the default loader of CoreCLR, so that we can make it much easier to host powershell in applications -- it will be just like hosting powershell in FullCLR applications. When beta.3 published, I need to update the README.md in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/2d06c17093f8ce7805e24e83f86925275aa038f0/docs/host-powershell and add one more sample using beta.3 packages.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @iSazonov Yep 😄. Technically we should close this after merging the release branch to master ...

title: Update 'host-powershell' README.md when beta.3 release is done
